sqlMap.select: select depart_purchase.*,t.operation ,u.truename as purchaseName from depart_purchase left join ( select * from (select operation,foreign_id from flow where type=22 order by id desc limit 10000000 ) as f group by foreign_id ) t on t.foreign_id=depart_purchase.id left join user u on u.id=depart_purchase.create_id where depart_purchase.id=#id#
select * from depart_purchase where create_id = #uid# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
select count(id) from depart_purchase where purchaseTime=#cur_time#

select depart_purchase.*,t.operation,user.truename as purchaseName,t.create_time as update_time from depart_purchase left join ( select * from (select operation,foreign_id,create_time from flow where type=22 order by id desc limit 10000000 ) as f group by foreign_id ) t on t.foreign_id=depart_purchase.id left join user on depart_purchase.create_id=user.id where t.operation!=7 and t.operation!=6 and user.position_id !=56
select depart_purchase.*,user.truename as purchaseName from depart_purchase left join user on depart_purchase.create_id=user.id
